message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially setting the price at $12,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for it.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I value your interest, the product's intrinsic worth to me is higher than your offer.  Would you consider $11,000?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose $10,500 as the purchase price.
